143.content: I believe I'm obligated to split this into Storylines, so if someone doesn't want to add to one but still wants to add to Hoenn they can. So then...
143.title: Storyline Divide

1431.content:
((I assume it's okay if pokemon from later generations appear in regions from earlier games, right?))

Felix was not an easy fellow to read. It could be that his face wasn't really visible most of the time, it could be be because his voice didn't really carry that often, or maybe it was his attitude. Let's be honest, it was probably his size, though.
Felix had been a trainer for a little while, now just past his 19th birthday, and his dull hair was matted with experience and various fluids. He wore some sort of special clothes that dried quickly and always scaled with him, not that that happened often. Casual gray sweatpants, long sweater, short socks. And no shoes most of the time (He didn't do a lot of walking). Felix had a bit of a straying mood, likely induced by his company. Felix, as a Pokemon trainer, had three pokemon he kept with him. Unfortunately for him, they were each girls blessed with the power to change the size of anyone, including themselves, and especially including him. They were:

Venus , the Goodra, who was rather chubby and curvaceous, and tended to use her power to toy around with Felix. She was the leader out of the three, and the one he caught first. She's generally rather dominant, but he knew she would never cross any sort of line. She was rather social and enjoyed sharing company. Her favorite thing: hot days when everyone is outside.

Hannah, the Leafeon, who was built the tallest and most slender of the three, and liked to use her power on everybody, especially herself. Hannah was caught second, as an Eevee, and was evolved most recently of all Felix's companions. She was a party girl, and made situations that she thought were fun without really giving it a second thought. She wasn't very responsible, but didn't really care for violence or anything extreme. She was loud and boisterous and braggy, but definitely the most gentle of the three. Her favorite thing: small, tight rooms and spaces.

And Reina, the Mareep, who was fluffy and voluptuous, and tried to be as clear as possible that she owned Felix, not the other way around, thank you very much. Reina didn't talk to many, but around him she was booming, and expressed that she was his queen often. She was the most rough with Felix of the three girls, and treated him like a toy, a slave, a servant, it all. She was a bit egocentric, and certainly loose in the empathy department, but Felix loved her nonetheless. She was caught last. Her favorite thing: privacy.

Felix was traveling in the Hoenn region, shrunken to a handheld size by his Pokemon. He had trouble keeping them in their ball. They had just set up camp, when one had taken him away from the other two girls.

Who got first crack at you?
1431.title: Storyline 1

choices: The girls compromise, and pass the tiny trainer around.
One of the girls uses their power on you/themselves...
14311.content:
Felix was pulled aside by your Goodra, Venus. She had taken him into the tent, leaving the other two girls outside. She held him in one hand, and then sat down in one corner of the tent, unfurling her thick fingers from around his pocket-sized form. He sat in her palm for a brief moment before speaking up.

"What's going on, Venus? Why have you done this?" He asked. Felix had a tendency to speak in a roundabout and arbitrary fashion, often using grammatical tenses that don't fit with the flow of conversation. He was an odd bird, even without the strange and powerful company.

"I just thought we could play a little, Licks, is that so bad?" The purple dragoness tried to justify herself. "Licks" was the most recent in a number of attempts on her part to give Felix a diminutive nickname. Whenever she gave him a nickname, it trickled down through the other two girls before it dropped out of use and Venus came up with another one. He used to respond with some variant of "eww, don't call me that" but that usually got him in trouble, and with girls several times his size, staying out of trouble was definitely preferable.

"We could play a little what, exactly? I'm none too keen to spend another night in -"
"That was one time!" Venus interrupted. Some extra color pooled in her cheeks. "And I wasn't lying when I said I couldn't get you out! It was my bad, but seriously, let go, dude, it's embarrassing."
"I shall in the future make the attempt to let go."
"Weirdo."

They sat in awkward silence for a couple seconds. Felix shifted awkwardly in her cupped hand, lying on his stomach now.
"I'll repeat, then. We could play a little what," he took a breathy pause, and then he said with more impact this time, "Exactly?"
Venus blushed heavily, sucking in her lips a little at his prodding. She pushed the hand he lay upon up between her breasts, dropping him in the canyon. He was caught between them, and she shook them once just to show him who was boss.
"We could play 'til you drop, Licks, so don't be so rude," Venus retorted, then poked her trainer's head, and pushed him deeper in the canyon. "I could shrink you until you're a microbe if I wanted to, you know."
Felix gave some kind of muffled reply in between the large orbs, but she couldn't make it out. She didn't really care too much, anyway.
"We've gotta get moving to Fortree City tomorrow. Tonight, let's just enjoy each other, huh? You'll just be mine and mine alone for the night, 'kay?"
A muffled groan came from between the two hefty spheres, and the struggling slowed down. Venus let out a sigh, and sat back, leaning against a pair of legs. She looked up. Hannah was staring back at her, leaning over invasively.

"Whatcha up to???" She asked, drooping over to look at the goo girl.
"Uhh, nothing, nothing, really -" Venus tried to sound bored.
"Oh, 'zat so? If you aren't doing anything, can I have my little Felix, please? I want to rub him all over my - hm?" Hannah fell forward as Venus slid away, and the Leafeon tumbled forward and over on top of her. Her legs lay at weird angles on Venus' shoulders, her arms down and straight past her navel, face pushed in a scrunched up mess at the Goodra's ankles, and her pelvis was right on top of Felix, who was pushed on the right and left by Venus' boobs and on top by Hannah's crotch. Venus turned away and tried to get the slender but surprisingly heavy figure off her.

"H-Hey! Get off me! Your butt's in my face!"
"I'm trying, but I can't get up! Eww, you're so sticky all over!"
"This is your fault! You had to be so nosy, Hannah, jeez!"

This went on for a few minutes before Reina came in, as well.
"Well, well. Are you two fighting over my little servant again? Well, I'll wrench him out from you two if I must." She scoffed, then paced over to the other two pokegirls and stuck her arms into the pile of girl, also. Eventually, she found her target, and pulled him out from betwixt Venus' breasts. "I believe you'll be tending to me tonight, tiny." She pinched him tightly, starting to leave before being tackled by Hannah, then Venus shortly thereafter. The three of them fought in a messy heap, each crawling all over one another to grab Felix away. He tried to protest, as he was messily tossed about from boob to hand to fist, and as he got caught under and between his three pokemon, but such was not to be. These girls were unyielding. In his world, there was no choosing between these three.

Eventually, they all tuckered themselves out, and Felix found himself slipping downward, out of the clutches of the girls and back in between Venus' large tits. Looks like she got what she wanted after all. Felix yawned, and dozed off to sleep...

The next morning...

Your family was going to the premiere of " The Giant Woman 2 ". The original was your mothers favorite movie, you loved it for a whole different reason. You looked at the large poster outside, it depicted one of the stars of the film, Sabrina about to stamp on a house with people running in fear as the other star, Monica attempting to stop her.

Rubbing your trainer's back with a black-furred paw, you push him into your fur, smooshing his head in between your large breasts. He liked - no, loved your breasts, but he would never admit it. Having come from a village where size-changing powers were unheard of, your trainer received a shock to the system when he realised you could shrink or grow him at will - though you very much preferred to shrink him. Or grow yourself. He had caught you, believing that you were merely an anthro Lucario, not a goddess, and you had decided to allow him to command you and take you on his travels - he was a rather cute thing, after all.

Shifting uncomfortably, your trainer attempts to remove his head from your cleavage, before you undertake two actions: firstly, one of your paws presses his head back in. Secondly, your breasts suddenly fwoomp out larger, instantly enevloping his entire head in warm, jiggling flesh. "G-goodnight, Luca..." her mumbles from within your cleavage.

info.brief_description: Female trainers and anthro female Pokemon can grow themselves and shrink others!
info.description:
Inspired by one of my favorite DeviantART RPs, this interactive takes place in an alternate version of the Pokemon world, where gifted female trainers and rare anthropomorphic female Pokemon are blessed with the ability to grow themselves and shrink others!

This is an 18+ interactive, so most anything goes, though I myself am partial to:

Butt
Breast
Insertion
Soft Vore
Fart
Gentle/Playful

Things such as feet, violent, and toilet are allowed as well.

I will award good additions with up to 1000 points depending on how I judge the quality.

Based on this RP: http://uberking422.deviantart.com/art/Pokemon-Giantess-Error-RP-375915140
